greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sum of squares of primes = 1 mod 3 dividing n.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10001
formula: Additive with a(p^e) = p^2 if p = 1 (mod 3), 0 otherwise.
mathematica: Module[{sp=Select[Prime[Range[100]],Mod[#,3]==1&]},Table[Total[ Select[ sp, Divisible[ n,#]&]^2],{n,70}]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Dec 19 2014 *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
